definition: surname Ji/ancient Chinese city state near modern day Beijing
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
Ji county in Tianjin 天津[Tian1 jin1]
old name for Beijing 北京[Bei3 jing1]

sentences.english: The thistle is one of their food sources.
sentences.chinese: 植物蓟来源于它们的食物。

sentences.english: Steam a few artichokes in white wine.
sentences.chinese: 白葡萄酒中加入少许朝鲜蓟。

sentences.english: Thistle bird feeders are the only way to attract thistle birds to your yard .
sentences.chinese: 唯一的办法是饲鸟蓟吸引鸟类蓟贵院子里。

sentences.english: Transfer the artichokes to a plate, drizzle them with pan juices, and serve.
sentences.chinese: 将朝鲜蓟装入盘子里，浇上锅里的汤汁，上桌。

sentences.english: Artichoke extract stimulates bile production, promoting fat digestion and metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜蓟提取物刺激胆汁分泌，促进脂肪消化和代谢。

sentences.english: Late thistles make spectacular purple accents.
sentences.chinese: 晚蓟却争紫斗艳，引人入胜。

sentences.english: Cut the artichokes and red pepper and fry them.
sentences.chinese: 把朝鲜蓟和辣椒切碎然后油炸。

sentences.english: Late thellostles make spectacular purple accents.
sentences.chinese: 晚蓟却争紫斗艳，惹人入胜。

sentences.english: Artichokes are interesting in and of themselves as they are self-mineralizing in nature.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜蓟自身长短常有趣的，因为它们会自我矿化。

sentences.english: Motorcyclists must wear helmets to shield them injury.
sentences.chinese: 摩脱车手辟须带头盔保护卦蓟免受伤害。

sentences.english: BLUEBIRD and ARTICHOKE were administered in a compartmented fashion.
sentences.chinese: 蓝知更鸟和朝鲜蓟被放在一个单独的房间里管理。

sentences.english: The first recorded name of Beijing is "Ji"(thistle).
sentences.chinese: 北京最初见于记载的名字为“蓟”。

definition: river and county in Hebei Province
name of a district in Hebei
Chinese scholar tree (Sophora japonica)/Japanese pagoda tree
chaste tree or berry (Vitex agnus-castus)/alternative name for the Zhou Dynasty state of Chu 楚國|楚国[Chu3 guo2]
